<item>
<title>Temporada 1</title>
<link>$doregex[makelist]</link>

<regex>
  <name>makelist</name>
  <listrepeat><![CDATA[
        <title>[makelist.param3]</title>
        <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
		<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
		<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
        ]]></listrepeat>
<expres><![CDATA[href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)<]]></expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t1-74069/list,1,2</page>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>getUrl</name>
<expres>DownloadUrl":"([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&amp;f=[makelist.param1]</page>
<rawpost>fileId=[makelist.param1]&amp;__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok]</rawpost>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<accept>*/*</accept>
<X-Req>XMLHttpRequest</X-Req>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>tok</name>
<expres>DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</page>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t1-74069/list,1,2</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
</item>

<item>
<title>Temporada 2</title>
<link>$doregex[makelist]</link>

<regex>
  <name>makelist</name>
  <listrepeat><![CDATA[
        <title>[makelist.param3]</title>
        <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
		<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
		<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
        ]]></listrepeat>
<expres><![CDATA[href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)<]]></expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t2-74093/list,1,2</page>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>getUrl</name>
<expres>DownloadUrl":"([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&amp;f=[makelist.param1]</page>
<rawpost>fileId=[makelist.param1]&amp;__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok]</rawpost>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<accept>*/*</accept>
<X-Req>XMLHttpRequest</X-Req>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>tok</name>
<expres>DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</page>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t2-74093/list,1,2</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
</item>

<item>
<title>Temporada 3</title>
<link>$doregex[makelist]</link>

<regex>
  <name>makelist</name>
  <listrepeat><![CDATA[
        <title>[makelist.param3]</title>
        <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
		<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
		<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
        ]]></listrepeat>
<expres><![CDATA[href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)<]]></expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t3-74267/list,1,2</page>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>getUrl</name>
<expres>DownloadUrl":"([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&amp;f=[makelist.param1]</page>
<rawpost>fileId=[makelist.param1]&amp;__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok]</rawpost>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<accept>*/*</accept>
<X-Req>XMLHttpRequest</X-Req>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>tok</name>
<expres>DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</page>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t3-74267/list,1,2</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>

<item>
<title>Temporada 4</title>
<link>$doregex[makelist]</link>

<regex>
  <name>makelist</name>
  <listrepeat><![CDATA[
        <title>[makelist.param3]</title>
        <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
		<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
		<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
        ]]></listrepeat>
<expres><![CDATA[href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)<]]></expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t4-74268/list,1,2</page>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>getUrl</name>
<expres>DownloadUrl":"([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&amp;f=[makelist.param1]</page>
<rawpost>fileId=[makelist.param1]&amp;__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok]</rawpost>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<accept>*/*</accept>
<X-Req>XMLHttpRequest</X-Req>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>tok</name>
<expres>DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</page>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t4-74268/list,1,2</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>

<item>
<title>Temporada 5 </title>
<link>$doregex[makelist]</link>

<regex>
  <name>makelist</name>
  <listrepeat><![CDATA[
        <title>[makelist.param3]</title>
        <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
		<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
		<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
        ]]></listrepeat>
<expres><![CDATA[href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)<]]></expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t5-74269/list,1,2</page>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>getUrl</name>
<expres>DownloadUrl":"([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&amp;f=[makelist.param1]</page>
<rawpost>fileId=[makelist.param1]&amp;__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok]</rawpost>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<accept>*/*</accept>
<X-Req>XMLHttpRequest</X-Req>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<regex>
<name>tok</name>
<expres>DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+)<expres>
<page>http://copiapop.com/[makelist.param2]</page>
<referer>http://copiapop.com/Cuspide/los-vigilantes-de-la-playa-t5-74269/list,1,2</referer>
<connection>keep-alive</connection>
<cookieJar></cookieJar>
</regex>
<thumbnail>http://filmlinks.tv/images/8/8/6/8/6/4/3.jpg</thumbnail>
<fanart>http://www.bolsamania.com/cine/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/2-5-600x399.jpg</fanart>
